text.more:
Network representation of the FromSoftware production network, early phase.
Node size based on weighted degree; node colors are based on the legend. Edge colors represent
different game works. Created with Gephi.

text.title: FromSoftware production network, early phase

legend.colorLabel: node colors = role category; edge color = game works
